execution_quality: Agent executed setup steps methodically with appropriate tool usage and error recovery, though the approach of fetching from web sources proved unnecessary when a local copy was available.
work_category: System setup and recovery after reboot. Agent diagnosed environment state, set up necessary tools and configurations, and prepared for continued work on a Linux kernel project.
summary: Agent performed post-reboot setup and prepared for task continuation, but took a suboptimal approach by attempting web fetches when local resources existed.
